name: 1970s Milo Baughman for Forecast Furniture Plinth Base Cream Loveseat Sofa

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: A Milo Baughman for Forecast Furniture plinth base loveseat sofa. This gorgeous sofa features a very 70s design. This sofa has a very iconic Milo Baughman plinth base design that curves around the underside of the piece, perfectly contrasting the sharper corners of the sofa itself. The fabric upholstery is a very soft and textured cotton loop design, which adds a ton of character and style to this simple design. Additionally, this sofa has 3 back cushions and one very large seat cushion, all of which are fully removable and feature zippers for easy cleaning. The original Forecast Furniture tag is underneath the seat cushion as pictured above. This piece is in very good vintage condition. This sofa measures 25.5 inches tall, 81 inches long, and 35 inches deep. It has a seat height of 17 inches, a seat depth of 19 inches, an arm height of 10 inches, a back height of 11 inches, and a seat width of 72 inches.
